data.event: Kent was part of the Philipse Patent of 1697, when it was still populated by the Wappinger tribe.
Elisha Cole and his wife Hannah Smalley built Coles Mills in 1748, having moved to that location the previous year from Cape Cod.
Coles Mill operated until 1888 when it was submerged under West Branch Reservoir.

event.title: moved to Kent about two years

data.event: The father of Hannah Smalley and his family moved to Kent about two years before Elisha Cole and his family.
